name: Last Caress
description:
It's the late summer of 1995.

Sarah returns home after some time when she's faced with her troublesome past. 

After a mysterious infected bite wound is discovered, zombies start taking over the streets. 

Sarah, trying to save the ones she loves, is forced to fight the zombies.

(It's a very short story game with simple battle's. Some graphics choices don't make sense.)
